description: Sample support tickets with conversations for Support Memory Hub demo

tickets.subject: Password reset not working
tickets.description: I tried to reset my password but didn't receive the email. This is the second time this has happened.

conversations.message: I clicked the password reset link but didn't get an email. Can you help?
I've checked your account and see that password reset emails were sent. Please check your spam folder. If you still don't see it, I can manually reset it for you.
Found it in spam! Thanks. But this happened last month too. Is there a way to prevent this?
I can whitelist our domain in your email settings. I'll send you instructions. Also, we're working on improving email deliverability.

tickets.resolution: Email found in spam folder. Customer whitelisted domain.

tickets.subject: API rate limit exceeded
tickets.description: I'm getting 429 errors when making API calls. I thought my plan included 10,000 requests per day.

conversations.message: My API calls are being rate limited. I'm on the Pro plan which should have 10k requests/day.
Let me check your usage. I see you've made 12,000 requests today. The limit is per calendar day, and you hit it at 2 PM. The limit resets at midnight UTC.
Oh, I see. Is there a way to get higher limits?
Yes! We have an Enterprise plan with 100k requests/day and custom limits. I can have our sales team reach out if you're interested.

tickets.resolution: Customer exceeded daily limit. Explained reset time and offered Enterprise plan.

tickets.subject: Data export feature not working
tickets.description: I'm trying to export my data to CSV but the download button doesn't work. I need this for my monthly report.

conversations.message: The CSV export button isn't working. I've tried Chrome and Firefox. This is urgent - I need the data for a report due today.
I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Let me check if there's a known issue. Can you tell me what happens when you click the button?
Nothing happens. No error, no download, nothing.
I see the issue - there's a bug with exports over 10k rows. I can generate the export manually for you right now. What date range do you need?

tickets.subject: Follow-up: Email deliverability improvement
tickets.description: Following up on ticket-001. I whitelisted the domain but still having issues with emails going to spam.

conversations.message: Hi, I'm following up on my previous ticket about password reset emails. I whitelisted your domain but emails are still going to spam. Can you check if there's something else I need to do?
I see your previous ticket. Let me check our email authentication records. I notice we've updated our SPF and DKIM records since your last ticket. I'll send you updated instructions.

tickets.subject: Integration with Salesforce not syncing
tickets.description: I set up the Salesforce integration last week but data isn't syncing. The connection test passed.

conversations.message: My Salesforce integration isn't syncing data. The connection test shows it's connected, but no data has come through in 3 days.
Let me check the sync logs. I see the connection is active but the sync schedule is set to 'manual only'. You need to enable automatic syncing in the integration settings.
Ah, I see it now. I've enabled it. How long until the first sync runs?
The first sync will start within 5 minutes. You can also trigger a manual sync now if you want immediate results.

tickets.resolution: Customer enabled automatic syncing. First sync scheduled.
